item.title: 中国因恒大事件对普华永道处以罚款并停止业务六个月
item.description: 中国因普华永道会计师事务所在中国恒大集团审计中的作用，将其部分业务停止六个月。【原文：China halted some of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP’s business for six months for its role in auditing China Evergrande Group.】

item.title: 欧洲央行穆勒称对通胀放缓的信心增强
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒（Madis Muller）在一份书面声明中说，整个欧元区的通胀势头正在放缓，人们越来越相信通胀已成为过去。【原文：Inflation’s momentum is slowing across the euro area and there’s growing confidence that it’s becoming a thing of the past, European Central Bank Governing Council Member Madis Muller said in a written statement.】

item.description:

item.title: 受台风肆虐的东南亚将迎来更多暴雨
item.description: 东南亚数百万人正准备迎接预计将持续到周末的更多降雨，这将使今年袭击亚洲的最强风暴超强台风 "八木 "已经造成的损失雪上加霜。【原文：Millions in Southeast Asia are bracing for more rain expected through the weekend, which would add to the damage already caused by Super Typhoon Yagi, the strongest storm to hit Asia this year.】

item.title: 被胡塞武装袭击的油轮将在未来数日内展开新一轮救援行动
item.description: 据驻扎在该地区的一支欧盟海军部队称，未来几天，红海上的船只将再次尝试把一艘燃烧的油轮拖到安全地带。【原文：Ships in the Red Sea will try again to tow a burning oil tanker to safety in the coming days, according to a European Union naval force in the region.】

item.title: 据说数字桥公司正在探索出售电信塔业务 EdgePoint
item.description: 知情人士透露，DigitalBridge Group Inc. 正在考虑包括出售东南亚公司 EdgePoint Infrastructure 在内的各种选择，这是投资者对电信资产需求增加的最新迹象。【原文：DigitalBridge Group Inc. is considering options including a sale of Southeast Asian firm EdgePoint Infrastructure, people with knowledge of the matter said, in the latest sign of increasing investor demand for telecommunications assets.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行关注通胀低于或高于目标的风险
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行在继续逐步降息的同时，必须小心谨慎，避免通胀目标过低或过高。【原文：The European Central Bank must be careful not to undershoot or overshoot its inflation target as it continues to gradually cut interest rates, Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: Praet 称，美联储大幅降息可能促使欧洲央行在 10 月采取行动
item.description: 欧洲央行前首席经济学家彼得-普拉埃特（Peter Praet）表示，美联储下周将进行更大规模的降息，这提高了欧洲央行在 10 月份采取行动的可能性。【原文：A larger Federal Reserve interest-rate cut next week raises the chances of the European Central Bank moving in October, according to Peter Praet, a former ECB chief economist.】

item.title: 兴登堡公司向阿达尼公司开炮，声称瑞士正在进行调查
item.description: 兴登堡研究公司再次向阿达尼集团发难，声称瑞士检察官一直在调查这家印度企业集团的洗钱行为。【原文：Hindenburg Research is taking another swing at Adani Group with claims that Swiss prosecutors have been investigating the Indian conglomerate for money laundering.】

item.title: 欧洲央行有 "充分理由 "在通胀放缓时降息：雷恩
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，欧洲中央银行周四有 "充分的理由 "放宽货币政策并降低利率，因为通胀继续放缓，对物价涨幅的预期接近央行的通胀目标。【原文：The European Central Bank had “good reasons” to ease monetary policy on Thursday and cut interest rates as inflation continues to slow down with expectations for price gains near the central bank’s inflation target, according to Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】

item.title: 英国通信管理局称沃达丰与 Three 的交易可能损害移动市场
item.description: 英国反垄断监督机构初步认定，沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）以 150 亿英镑（约合 197 亿美元）收购长江和记控股有限公司（CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd）英国分公司的交易可能会导致客户支付更多费用。【原文：Vodafone Group Plc’s £15 billion ($19.7 billion) deal to buy the UK unit of CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd could lead to customers having to pay more, Britain’s antitrust watchdog provisionally found.】

item.title: 需求减少，茅台面临最严重的秋节前低迷
item.description: 在中秋节前一天的交易中，贵州茅台酒股份有限公司（Kweichow Moutai Co.【原文：Shares of Kweichow Moutai Co. were set for their biggest-ever fall in trading for the day before the Mid-Autumn festival as China’s sluggish economy dented demand for its liquor and other premium goods.】

item.title: DSV 以 143 亿欧元收购德国铁路物流部门
item.description: DSV A/S 同意以 143 亿欧元（159 亿美元）的企业价值收购德国铁路股份公司（Deutsche Bahn AG）的物流部门，这笔交易将使这家丹麦公司成为全球最大的货运代理公司。【原文：DSV A/S agreed to buy Deutsche Bahn AG’s logistics unit at an enterprise value of €14.3 billion ($15.9 billion) in a deal that will turn the Danish company into the world’s largest freight-forwarder.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将扩大涨幅，英镑上涨
item.description: 2024 年 6 月 20 日星期四，英国伦敦金融城，左为英格兰银行（BOE），右为皇家交易所。英国通胀率近三年来首次回落至英国央行2%的目标。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：The Bank of England (BOE), left, and Royal Exchange, right, in the City of London, UK, on Thursday, June 20, 2024. British inflation fell back to the Bank of England’s 2% target for the first time in almost three years. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 德国央行行长就德国商业银行与意大利联合信贷银行的潜在交易发表看法
item.description: 德国央行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，需要稳健的银行来确保企业获得所需的融资。【原文：Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said robust banks are required to ensure companies get the financing they need.】

item.title: 西姆库斯称，通胀趋势表明欧洲央行必须采取更多削减措施
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，欧洲央行必须继续降低借贷成本，不过这种举措的步伐将取决于即将公布的数据。【原文：The European Central Bank must continue to lower borrowing costs, though the pacing of such moves will dependent on incoming data, according to Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus.】

item.title: 中国呼吁举行会谈结束战争，北京寻求全球影响力
item.description: 中国国防部长董军呼吁通过谈判结束乌克兰和加沙战争，并将中国描绘成和平缔造者，因为北京正寻求在全球安全事务中发挥更大影响力。【原文：China’s Defense Minister Dong Jun called for ending the wars in Ukraine and Gaza through negotiations, portraying the country as a peacemaker as Beijing seeks greater influence on security matters worldwide.】

item.title: 俄罗斯袭击可能迫使乌克兰钢铁企业进口煤炭
item.description: 如果俄罗斯军队攻占顿涅茨克前线附近乌克兰唯一的煤矿，乌克兰钢铁企业可能被迫进口炼焦煤，这将对陷入困境的钢铁行业造成又一次打击。【原文：Ukrainian steelmakers may be forced to import coking coal if Russian forces overwhelm the nation’s only mine near the front line in Donetsk, dealing another blow to the embattled industry.】

item.title: 这些不是特朗普以前的关税—真的
item.description:

item.title: 佐科维称领导权交接前不会采取极端政策
item.description: 印尼总统佐科-维多多（Joko Widodo）命令内阁在下月领导层交接之前保持稳定，避免实施任何突然的政策变动。【原文：Indonesia’s President Joko Widodo ordered his cabinet to maintain stability and avoid implementing any abrupt policy changes ahead of the leadership transition next month.】

item.title: 菲律宾称中国企业不顾紧张局势热衷投资
item.description: 马尼拉一位高级贸易官员周五表示，尽管两国在南海问题上存在争议，但中国公司仍有兴趣在菲律宾投资。【原文：Chinese companies are still interested to invest in the Philippines despite the nations’ dispute in the South China Sea, a top Manila trade official said on Friday.】

item.title: Bicara 领衔三家美国生物技术公司 IPO，融资 7.03 亿美元
item.description: 周四，三家生物技术公司在首次公开募股中售出了股票，这对于一个新进入者近来举步维艰的行业来说是一个令人鼓舞的迹象。【原文：A trio of biotech companies sold shares in their initial public offerings on Thursday, an encouraging sign for a sector whose new entrants have lately struggled.】

item.title: 市场面临风险，英国廉价股票吸引投资者
item.description:
在Merryn Talks Money节目中，基金经理马克-斯莱特（Mark Slater）警告说，虽然股票价值被低估，但英国股票市场本身已经 "被掏空"。【原文：

On Merryn Talks Money, fund manager Mark Slater warns that while stocks are undervalued, the British equities market itself has been “hollowed out.”

】

item.title: 随着量化宽松政策退出，新西兰央行资产负债表缩减至 2021 年以来最小值
item.description: 随着新西兰储备银行继续减持在大流行病期间购买的债券，该银行的资产负债表已缩减至三年多来的最小值。【原文：The Reserve Bank of New Zealand’s balance sheet has shrunk to its smallest in more than three years as the central bank continues to reduce its holdings of bonds bought during the pandemic.】

item.title: 劳力士涨价，欧米茄二手手表价格在奥运推动下仍下跌
item.description: 尽管作为巴黎奥运会的官方计时赞助商，瑞士品牌欧米茄的二手手表备受瞩目，但其价格在上个月仍出现下跌。【原文：Prices for used watches made by Swiss brand Omega suffered declines in the past month despite the high profile exposure it received as the official timekeeping sponsor of the Paris Olympics.】

item.title: 赞比亚铜矿急需电力，找到了不可能的救星
item.description: 赞比亚最大的矿场正在转向一个令人惊讶的电力来源，因为这个铜矿生产国正在与前所未有的能源危机作斗争：南非电力公司 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.（Eskom 控股 SOC 有限公司）直到 3 月份还面临着严重的电力短缺。【原文：Zambia’s biggest mines are turning to a surprising power source as the copper-producing nation battles an unprecedented energy crisis: South African electricity company Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd., which until March faced its own severe deficit.】

item.title: 据称 Blackstone 考虑出售价值 70 亿美元的签证公司 VFS
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士称，Blackstone Inc. 在收到潜在投资者的兴趣后，正在考虑各种方案，包括出售其在签证外包和技术服务公司 VFS Global 的多数股权。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is considering options including a sale of its majority stake in visa outsourcing and technology services firm VFS Global after receiving interest from prospective investors, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 黑客攻击台湾证券交易所和主要银行，这是一起神秘的外国攻击事件
item.description: 周四，黑客攻击了台湾的金融平台，包括证券交易所和贷款机构兆丰金融控股有限公司（Mega Financial Holding Co.【原文：Hackers hit Taiwanese financial platforms including the stock exchange and lender Mega Financial Holding Co. on Thursday, briefly disrupting their websites in what local media described as an attack by foreign agents.】
